system.description:
Covers thieving and a variety of illicit, underhanded skills. Use this skill to subtly pry open a door, pick a lock, set or disable a trap, pick someone’s pocket, or perform some comparable act of thievery or burglary. Depending on the application, Skullduggery checks may be opposed by a target’s Observation or Intuition.

Specialisation options: pick pockets, pick locks, set traps, disable traps, palm objects
